import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import s from "./header.module.css"; import { UilBell, UilEnvelope, UilHome, UilMessage, UilNewspaper, UilPlay, UilSearch, UilSetting, UilUser, UilUsersAlt, UilYinYang, } from "@iconscout/react-unicons"; import miniAva from "../../assets/UserImageSample.jpg"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import useSelection from "antd/lib/table/hooks/useSelection"; import { RootState } from "../../store/store"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { meTC } from "../../store/reducers/authReducer"; export const Header = () => { const isAuthorized = useSelector(state => state.auth.isAuthorized) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { meTC(dispatch()) }, []) return (
    • {/*
    • */}
); };
